oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Excerpt from consolidation interview with Ken Miller, June 12, 1995
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An excerpt from an interview with Ken Miller, conducted on June 12, 1995 by Carole Bucy as part of the Metro Consolidation Oral History Interviews. Miller discusses his role in the consolidation of the city and county governments. He also comments briefly on other individuals and their contributions. The complete record of the interview is available at the Metro Government Archives.
